basics.name: Chikezie
basics.label: Contract Azure C# Developer Architect
basics.summary: I'm a developer specialized in C#. Currently, I'm deeply fascinated with large data, particularly streaming data via Azure Stream Analytics. I'm keen on exploring efficient ways to visualise vast datasets using Python and JavaScript libraries.
